name: bombermanos
description: Game utilizando react, tailwind, typescript, redis e postgres

scripts.install: npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.dev: start "Server" npm run dev:server && start "Client" npm run dev:client
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.start: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run start:server

author: Luis Gustavo CZP
